deployment
Class DeploymentPlanScheduler

java.lang.Object
  deployment.DeploymentPlanScheduler

public class DeploymentPlanScheduler
extends java.lang.Object

This handles the scheduling of graph rebuilds in the future. It is a layer of abstraction between the DB and the deployment planner - if one wanted to schedule plans without using the DB, a superclass/interface could be extracted from this and used to create a new deployment plan scheduler.

Author:
mattwigway
